function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global warming leading to an increased burden of mosquito-borne diseases","Impact":"Higher occurrence of diseases affecting health, including malaria and arboviral diseases","Mitigation":"Reducing carbon emissions, implementing climate change policies, and controlling mosquito populations","Technologies":"Climate monitoring and modeling, mosquito control technologies","People":"Populations living in areas susceptible to mosquito-borne diseases","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Globalization and increased international travel enabling the importation of invasive mosquito vectors and pathogens","Impact":"Spread of mosquito-borne diseases from endemic areas to formerly disease-free regions","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance at international borders, vector control programs, and public health education","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, genetic identification of mosquitoes, public health communication technologies","People":"Travelers, local communities in formerly disease-free regions","Owner":"Public health agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Temperature modifications influencing the epidemic potential of mosquito-borne diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to changes in mosquito and pathogen development and survival rates","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling mosquito breeding habitats, implementing climate change adaptation strategies","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies, habitat modification methods","People":"Communities in areas affected by temperature modifications","Owner":"Local governments, environmental agencies"}]}
